column1: Notes on changes compared to the initial budget:

column4: 1) the application is now deployed across 2 regions and 4 availability zones in each region
2) Applictaion in the second region will be used for a warm standby disaster recovery strategy
3) in addition, the running application in us-east-1 region will benefit from autoscaling to 4 web servers and 4 app servers to address spiky traffic

column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
